nfs4_op_open.c

00126 extern nfs_parameter_t nfs_param ;
00127 
00128 
00142 extern time_t ServerBootTime ;
00143 
00144 #define arg_OPEN4 op->nfs_argop4_u.opopen
00145 #define res_OPEN4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.opopen
00146 
00147 int nfs4_op_open(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,   
00148                    compound_data_t   * data,
00149                    struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00150 {
00151     cache_entry_t        * pentry_parent   = NULL ;
00152     cache_entry_t        * pentry_lookup   = NULL ;
00153     cache_entry_t        * pentry_newfile  = NULL ;    
00154     fsal_handle_t        * pnewfsal_handle = NULL ;
00155     fsal_attrib_list_t     attr_parent ;
00156     fsal_attrib_list_t     attr ;
00157     fsal_attrib_list_t     attr_newfile ;
00158     fsal_attrib_list_t     sattr ;
00159     fsal_openflags_t       openflags = 0 ; 
00160     cache_inode_status_t   cache_status ;
00161     nfsstat4               rc ;    
00162     int                    retval ;
00163     int                    open_mode ;
00164     uint32_t               supported_mode ;
00165     bitmap4                bitmap_set ;
00166     fsal_name_t            filename ;
00167     bool_t                 AttrProvided = FALSE ;
00168     fsal_accessmode_t      mode = 0000;
00169     nfs_fh4                newfh4 ;
00170     nfs_client_id_t        nfs_clientid ;
00171     unsigned int           i = 0 ;
00172     nfs_worker_data_t    * pworker = NULL ;
00173     int                    convrc = 0 ;
00174     char                   funcname[] = "nfs4_op_open" ;
00175 
00176 
00177     resp->resop = NFS4_OP_OPEN ;
00178     res_OPEN4.status =  NFS4_OK  ;
00179 
00180     pworker = (nfs_worker_data_t *)data->pclient->pworker ;
00181 
00182     /* If there is no FH */
00183     if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty( &(data->currentFH  ) ) )
00184       {
00185         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00186         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00187       }
00188   
00189     /* If the filehandle is invalid */
00190     if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid( &(data->currentFH ) ) )
00191       {
00192         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00193         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00194       }
00195     
00196     /* Tests if the Filehandle is expired (for volatile filehandle) */
00197     if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired( &(data->currentFH) ) )
00198       {
00199         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00200         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00201       }
00202 
00203     /* If data->current_entry is empty, repopulate it */
00204     if( data->current_entry == NULL )
00205       {
00206         if ( ( data->current_entry = nfs_FhandleToCache( NFS_V4,
00207                                                       NULL,
00208                                                       NULL,
00209                                                       &(data->currentFH),
00210                                                       NULL,
00211                                                       NULL,
00212                                                       &(res_OPEN4.status),
00213                                                       &attr,
00214                                                       data->pcontext,
00215                                                       data->pclient,
00216                                                       data->ht,
00217                                                       &retval ) ) == NULL )
00218                 {
00219                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00220                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00221                 }
00222       }
00223 
00224     /* Set parent */
00225     pentry_parent = data->current_entry ;
00226  
00227     
00228     /* First switch is based upon claim type */
00229     switch(  arg_OPEN4.claim.claim )
00230      {
00231         case CLAIM_DELEGATE_CUR:
00232         case CLAIM_DELEGATE_PREV:
00233             /* Check for name length */
00234             if( arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file.utf8string_len > FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN )
00235              {
00236                 res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NAMETOOLONG ;
00237                 return res_OPEN4.status ;
00238              }
00239 
00240            /* get the filename from the argument, it should not be empty */
00241            if( arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file.utf8string_len == 0 )
00242              {
00243                res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00244                return res_OPEN4.status ;
00245              }
00246 
00247             res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NOTSUPP ;
00248             return res_OPEN4.status ;
00249             break ;
00250  
00251         case CLAIM_NULL:
00252             /* Check for name length */
00253             if( arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file.utf8string_len > FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN )
00254              {
00255                 res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NAMETOOLONG ;
00256                 return res_OPEN4.status ;
00257              }
00258 
00259            /* get the filename from the argument, it should not be empty */
00260            if( arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file.utf8string_len == 0 )
00261              {
00262                res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00263                return res_OPEN4.status ;
00264              }
00265 
00266            /* Check if asked attributes are correct */ 
00267            if(  arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == GUARDED4   ||
00268                 arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == UNCHECKED4  )
00269             {
00270               if( !nfs4_Fattr_Supported( &arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createattrs ) )
00271                 {
00272                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP ;
00273                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00274                 }
00275 
00276                 /* Do not use READ attr, use WRITE attr */
00277                if( !nfs4_Fattr_Check_Access( &arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createattrs, FATTR4_ATTR_WRITE ) )
00278                  {
00279                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00280                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00281                  }
00282             }
00283 
00284             /* Check if filename is correct */
00285             if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert( FSAL_buffdesc2name( (fsal_buffdesc_t *)&arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file, 
00286                                                                           &filename ) ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00287               {
00288                 res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00289                 return res_OPEN4.status ;
00290               }
00291 
00292             /* Check parent */
00293             pentry_parent = data->current_entry ;
00294 
00295             /* Parent must be a directory */
00296             if( ( pentry_parent->internal_md.type != DIR_BEGINNING ) &&  
00297                 ( pentry_parent->internal_md.type != DIR_CONTINUE )  )
00298               {
00299                 /* Parent object is not a directory... */
00300                 if(  pentry_parent->internal_md.type == SYMBOLIC_LINK )
00301                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SYMLINK ;
00302                 else
00303                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NOTDIR ;
00304 
00305                return res_OPEN4.status  ;
00306              }
00307 
00308            /* What kind of open is it ? */
00309 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00310         printf( "     OPEN: Claim type = %d   Open Type = %d  Share Deny = %d   Share Access = %d \n" ,
00311                 arg_OPEN4.claim.claim, arg_OPEN4.openhow.opentype, arg_OPEN4.share_deny, arg_OPEN4.share_access ) ;
00312 #endif
00313 
00314           /* It this a known client id ? */
00315 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00316           DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "OPEN Client id = %llx", arg_OPEN4.owner.clientid ) ;
00317 #endif
00318           if( nfs_client_id_get( arg_OPEN4.owner.clientid, &nfs_clientid ) != CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )
00319             {
00320               res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_STALE_CLIENTID ;
00321               return res_OPEN4.status ;
00322             }
00323 
00324           /* The client id should be confirmed */
00325           if( nfs_clientid.confirmed != CONFIRMED_CLIENT_ID )
00326             {
00327               res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_STALE_CLIENTID ;
00328               return res_OPEN4.status ;
00329             }
00330 
00331           /* Status of parent directory before the operation */
00332           if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry_parent, 
00333                                                     &attr_parent,
00334                                                     data->ht, 
00335                                                     data->pclient, 
00336                                                     data->pcontext, 
00337                                                     &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00338             {
00339               res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00340               return res_OPEN4.status ;
00341             }
00342           memset( &(res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before), 0, sizeof( changeid4) ) ;
00343           res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before = (changeid4)pentry_parent->internal_md.mod_time ;
00344 
00345           /* Second switch is based upon "openhow" */
00346           switch( arg_OPEN4.openhow.opentype )
00347             {
00348                 case OPEN4_CREATE:
00349                    /* a new file is to be created */ 
00350 
00351                    /* Does a file with this name already exist ? */
00352                    pentry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( pentry_parent,
00353                                                        &filename, 
00354                                                        &attr_newfile, 
00355                                                        data->ht, 
00356                                                        data->pclient, 
00357                                                        data->pcontext, 
00358                                                        &cache_status ) ;
00359         
00360                    if( cache_status != CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND )
00361                      {
00362                        /* if open is UNCHECKED, return NFS4_OK (RFC3530 page 172) */
00363                        if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == UNCHECKED4  )
00364                          {
00365                         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00366                         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00367                          }
00368 
00369                        /* if open is EXCLUSIVE, but verifier is the same, return NFS4_OK (RFC3530 page 173) */
00370                        if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == EXCLUSIVE4 )
00371                          {
00372                             if( pentry_lookup != NULL )
00373                              if( ( pentry_lookup->internal_md.type == REGULAR_FILE ) && ( pentry_lookup->object.file.pshare != NULL ) )
00374                               if( !strncmp( pentry_lookup->object.file.pshare->data.share.oexcl_verifier, 
00375                                             arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createverf, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE ) )
00376                                 {  
00377                                    /* This is a duplicated ESCLUSIVE4 call, verifier matches, return NFS4_OK */
00378                                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00379                                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00380                                 }
00381 
00382                          }
00383 
00384                        if( cache_status != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00385                          res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00386                        else
00387                          res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ; /* File already exists */
00388                        return res_OPEN4.status ;
00389                      }
00390 
00391 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00392                    printf( "    OPEN open.how = %d\n", arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode ) ;
00393 #endif
00394         
00395                    /* CLient may have provided fattr4 to set attributes at creation time */
00396                    if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == GUARDED4 || 
00397                        arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == UNCHECKED4 )
00398                      {
00399                        if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_len != 0 )
00400                          {
00401                            /* Convert fattr4 so nfs4_sattr */
00402                            convrc = nfs4_Fattr_To_FSAL_attr( &sattr, &(arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createattrs ) ) ;
00403 
00404                            if( convrc == 0 )
00405                              {
00406                                res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP  ;
00407                                return res_OPEN4.status ;
00408                              }
00409 
00410                            if( convrc == -1 )
00411                              {
00412                                res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_BADXDR ;
00413                                return res_OPEN4.status ;
00414                              }
00415 
00416                             
00417                            AttrProvided = TRUE ;
00418                          }
00419             
00420                      }
00421         
00422             
00423                    /* Create the file, if we reach this point, it does not exist, we can create it */
00424                    if( ( pentry_newfile = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent, 
00425                                                               &filename, 
00426                                                               REGULAR_FILE, 
00427                                                               mode, 
00428                                                               NULL,
00429                                                               &attr_newfile, 
00430                                                               data->ht,
00431                                                               data->pclient, 
00432                                                               data->pcontext, 
00433                                                               &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00434                      {
00435                        /* If the file already exists, this is not an error if open mode is UNCHECKED */
00437                        if( cache_status !=  CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00438                          {
00439                            res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00440                            return res_OPEN4.status ;
00441                          }
00442                      }
00443     
00444                     if( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare == NULL )
00445                       {
00446 
00447                         GET_PREALLOC( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare, 
00448                                       data->pclient->pool_state_v4,
00449                                       data->pclient->nb_pre_state_v4,
00450                                       cache_inode_state_v4_t,
00451                                       next ) ;
00452 
00453                         if( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare == NULL )
00454                          {
00455                            res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00456                            return res_OPEN4.status ;
00457                          }
00458                         memset( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare, 0, sizeof ( cache_inode_state_v4_t ) ) ;
00459                         pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->pentry = pentry_newfile ;
00460                         pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->state_type = CACHE_INODE_STATE_SHARE ;
00461                       }
00462 
00463                     /* If file is opened under mode EXCLUSIVE4, open verifier should be kept to detect non vicious double open */
00464                     if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == EXCLUSIVE4 )
00465                       {
00466                            strncpy( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->data.share.oexcl_verifier , 
00467                                     arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createverf, 
00468                                     NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE ) ;
00469                       } 
00470 
00471                     /* Set the share reservation state */
00472                     pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->data.share.share_deny      = arg_OPEN4.share_deny ;
00473                     pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->data.share.share_access    = arg_OPEN4.share_access ;
00474                     pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->data.share.claim_type      = arg_OPEN4.claim.claim ;
00475                     pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->clientid4                  = arg_OPEN4.owner.clientid ;
00476                     pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->client_inst_num            = nfs_clientid.client_inst_num ;
00477  
00478                     if( AttrProvided == TRUE ) /* Set the attribute if provided */
00479                       {
00480                         if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_setattr( pentry_newfile, 
00481                                                                   &sattr, 
00482                                                                   data->ht, 
00483                                                                   data->pclient, 
00484                                                                   data->pcontext, 
00485                                                                   &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00486                           {
00487                             res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00488                             return  res_OPEN4.status ;
00489                           }
00490             
00491                       }
00492 
00493                    /* Open the file */
00494                    if( cache_inode_open_by_name( pentry_parent,
00495                                                  &filename,
00496                                                  pentry_newfile,
00497                                                  data->pclient,
00498                                                  openflags,
00499                                                  data->pcontext,
00500                                                  &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00501                       {
00502                           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00503                           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00504                       }
00505 
00506                    break ;
00507 
00508 
00509                 case OPEN4_NOCREATE:
00510                   /* It was not a creation, but a regular open */
00511                   /* The filehandle to the new file replaces the current filehandle */
00512                   if( pentry_newfile == NULL )
00513                     {
00514                       if( ( pentry_newfile = cache_inode_lookup( pentry_parent,
00515                                                                  &filename, 
00516                                                                  &attr_newfile, 
00517                                                                  data->ht, 
00518                                                                  data->pclient, 
00519                                                                  data->pcontext, 
00520                                                                  &cache_status) ) == NULL )
00521                        {
00522                          res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00523                          return res_OPEN4.status ;
00524                        }
00525                     }
00526 
00527                   /* OPEN4 is to be done on a file */
00528                   if( pentry_newfile->internal_md.type != REGULAR_FILE ) 
00529                     {
00530                       if( pentry_newfile->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING || pentry_newfile->internal_md.type == DIR_CONTINUE )
00531                         {
00532                           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ISDIR ;
00533                           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00534                         }
00535                       else if(  pentry_newfile->internal_md.type == SYMBOLIC_LINK )
00536                         {
00537                           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SYMLINK ;
00538                           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00539                         }
00540                       else
00541                         {
00542                           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00543                           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00544                         }
00545                     }           
00546 
00547 
00548                   /* If the file is opened for write, OPEN4 while deny share write access,
00549                    * in this case, check caller has write access to the file */
00550                   if(  arg_OPEN4.share_deny  & OPEN4_SHARE_DENY_WRITE )
00551                     {
00552                         if( cache_inode_access( pentry_newfile,
00553                                                 FSAL_W_OK,
00554                                                 data->ht,
00555                                                 data->pclient,
00556                                                 data->pcontext,
00557                                                 &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00558                             {
00559                                   res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00560                                   return res_OPEN4.status ;
00561                             }
00562                          openflags = FSAL_O_WRONLY ;
00563                     }
00564 
00565                   /* Same check on read: check for readability of a file before opening it for read */
00566                   if(  arg_OPEN4.share_access  & OPEN4_SHARE_ACCESS_READ )
00567                     {
00568                         if( cache_inode_access( pentry_newfile,
00569                                                 FSAL_R_OK,
00570                                                 data->ht,
00571                                                 data->pclient,
00572                                                 data->pcontext,
00573                                                 &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00574                             {
00575                                   res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00576                                   return res_OPEN4.status ;
00577                             }
00578                          openflags = FSAL_O_RDONLY ;
00579                     }
00580 
00581                   /* If file mode is 000 then NFS4ERR_ACCESS should be returned for all cases and users */
00582                   if( attr_newfile.mode == 0 ) 
00583                    {
00584                         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00585                         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00586                    }
00587                      
00588  
00589                   /* Management of the share reservation */
00590                   if( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare != NULL )
00591                    {
00592                         if( !nfs4_is_lease_expired(  pentry_newfile) )
00593                           {
00594                           /* Lease is still available, check the access */
00595                           if( ( arg_OPEN4.share_access & pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->data.share.share_deny )  ||
00596                               ( arg_OPEN4.share_deny   & pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->data.share.share_access ) ) 
00597                             {
00598                               res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SHARE_DENIED ;
00599                               return res_OPEN4.status ;
00600                             }
00601                           }
00602                     }
00603 
00604 
00605                 /* Open the file */
00606                 if( cache_inode_open_by_name( pentry_parent, 
00607                                               &filename, 
00608                                               pentry_newfile,   
00609                                               data->pclient,
00610                                               openflags,
00611                                               data->pcontext,
00612                                               &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00613                    {
00614                        res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00615                        return res_OPEN4.status ;
00616                    }
00617                  break ; 
00618              
00619                 default:
00620                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00621                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00622                    break ;
00623             } /* switch( arg_OPEN4.openhow.opentype ) */
00624 
00625           break ; 
00626 
00627         case CLAIM_PREVIOUS:
00628           if( data->current_entry->object.file.pshare->data.share.claim_type == CLAIM_NULL )
00629              {
00630                  res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_RECLAIM_BAD ;
00631                  return res_OPEN4.status ;
00632              }
00633           break ;
00634 
00635         default:
00636           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00637           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00638           break ;
00639      } /*  switch(  arg_OPEN4.claim.claim ) */
00640 
00641 
00642     /* Now produce the filehandle to this file */
00643     if( ( pnewfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( pentry_newfile, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00644       {
00645         res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00646         return  res_OPEN4.status ;
00647       }
00648 
00649     /* Allocation of a new file handle */
00650     if( ( rc = nfs4_AllocateFH( &newfh4 ) ) != NFS4_OK )
00651       {
00652         res_OPEN4.status = rc ;
00653         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00654       }
00655   
00656     /* Building a new fh */
00657     if( !nfs4_FSALToFhandle( &newfh4, pnewfsal_handle, data ) )
00658       {
00659         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00660         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00661       }
00662     
00663     /* This new fh replaces the current FH */
00664     data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_len = newfh4.nfs_fh4_len ;
00665     memcpy( data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_val, newfh4.nfs_fh4_val, newfh4.nfs_fh4_len ) ;
00666     
00667     data->current_entry = pentry_newfile ;
00668     data->current_filetype = REGULAR_FILE ;
00669    
00670  
00671     /* No do not need newfh any more */
00672     Mem_Free( (char *)newfh4.nfs_fh4_val ) ;
00673   
00674     /* Status of parent directory after the operation */
00675     if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry_parent, 
00676                                               &attr_parent, 
00677                                               data->ht, 
00678                                               data->pclient, 
00679                                               data->pcontext, 
00680                                               &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00681       {
00682         res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00683         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00684       }
00685     
00686     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len = 0 ; /* No attributes set */
00687     
00688     /*  no NFS4_OP_OPEN_CONFIRM is necessary to complete the NFS4_OP_OPEN operation, and no POSIX lock behaviour is supported */
00689     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.rflags = 0 ;
00690     
00691     memset( &(res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after), 0, sizeof( changeid4 ) ) ;
00692     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after  = (changeid4)pentry_parent->internal_md.mod_time ;
00693     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.atomic = TRUE ;
00694     
00695 
00696     /* Build the state id */
00697     P( pentry_newfile->lock ) ;
00698     if( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare == NULL )
00699       {
00700          GET_PREALLOC( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare,
00701                        data->pclient->pool_state_v4,
00702                        data->pclient->nb_pre_state_v4,
00703                        cache_inode_state_v4_t,
00704                        next ) ;
00705 
00706          if( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare == NULL )
00707            {
00708              res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00709              V( pentry_newfile->lock ) ;
00710              return res_OPEN4.status ;
00711            }
00712           memset( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare, 0, sizeof ( cache_inode_state_v4_t ) ) ;
00713           pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->pentry = pentry_newfile ;
00714           pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->state_type = CACHE_INODE_STATE_SHARE ;
00715 
00716         /* Build state id */
00717         if( !nfs4_BuildStateId_Other( &res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid, data->current_entry, pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare ) ) 
00718           {
00719             res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00720             V( pentry_newfile->lock ) ;
00721             return res_OPEN4.status ;
00722           }
00723 
00724         /* Add state to state Hash Table */
00725         if( !nfs4_State_Set( &res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid, pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare ) ) 
00726           {
00727             res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00728             V( pentry_newfile->lock ) ;
00729             return res_OPEN4.status ;
00730           }
00731    
00732         memcpy( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->stateid_other,
00733                 res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid.other,
00734                 12 ) ;
00735 
00736       }
00737     else
00738       {
00739         /* Build state id */
00740         if( !nfs4_BuildStateId_Other( &res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid, data->current_entry, pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare ) ) 
00741           {
00742             res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00743             V( pentry_newfile->lock ) ;
00744             return res_OPEN4.status ;
00745           }
00746 
00747 
00748         /* Add state to state Hash Table */
00749         if( !nfs4_State_Set( &res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid, pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare ) ) 
00750           {
00751             res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00752             V( pentry_newfile->lock ) ;
00753             return res_OPEN4.status ;
00754           }
00755         
00756          memcpy( pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->stateid_other, 
00757                  res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid.other, 
00758                  12 ) ;
00759          pentry_newfile->object.file.pshare->pentry = pentry_newfile ;
00760       }
00761     V( pentry_newfile->lock ) ;
00762     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid.seqid = (seqid4)cache_inode_increment_seqid( pentry_newfile ) ;
00763 
00764 
00765     /* The rest of the stateid is made by fileid (4 bytes) + serverboottime (4 bytes) + 4 bytes used set to zero */
00766     /* BUGAZOMEU : utilisation cavaliere de *pnewfsal_handle */
00767     /* snprintf( res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid.other, 12, 
00768      *        "%04x%04x%04x", *pnewfsal_handle , ServerBootTime, 0 ) ; */
00769     
00770     /* No delegation */
00771     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.delegation.delegation_type = OPEN_DELEGATE_NONE ;
00772 
00773 
00774     /* regular exit */
00775     res_OPEN4.status = NFS4_OK ; 
00776     return res_OPEN4.status;
00777  
00778 } /* nfs4_op_open */
00779 
00780     
00791 void nfs4_op_open_Free( OPEN4res * resp )
00792 {
00793   /* Nothing to be done */
00794   return ;
00795 } /* nfs4_op_open_Free */
